Hier die wichtigsten Features im Ãberblick:â  Mobile Registrierungâ  Anzeige der verfÃ¼gbaren DriveNow Fahrzeuge auf Karte und Ã¼ber Listeâ  Fahrzeug mit zwei Klicks reservierenâ  Routing Funktion zum nÃ¤chsten freien Fahrzeugâ  DriveNow Account einsehen und bearbeitenâ  Fahrzeuge Ã¼ber Augmented Reality findenâ  Durch SchÃ¼tteln nÃ¤chstgelegenes freies Fahrzeug findenDriveNow, das innovative CarSharing von BMWi, MINI und SIXT, wÃ¼nscht seinen Mitgliedern viel SpaÃ mit der App.

reviews.title: Perfect app, nice concept
reviews.comment: Very useful app! You get a discount of 20\342\202\254 and 15 free minutes to drive if you use the following voucher at registration! Bonus code: VBUVDOCBOO
reviews.author: Tam\303\241s Szab\303\263

reviews.title: Great app, great rental-car alternative
reviews.comment: This app has been key to making DriveNow my go-to form of transportation around San Francisco. Only improvement I\'d suggest would be in fine-grained location of your reserved car in a crowded lot. Maybe a way to flash its lights?
reviews.author: Ken Andrade

reviews.title: Lovely App & Super Service
reviews.comment: Great App! B-) Been using it for a year Now & advice You to use my code: HLDLJUUPZH and safe up to 20\342\202\254 + get 15 minuten free to drive B-) Mini/BMW & Electronic cars!!! Just enjoy it & also safe cash B-)
reviews.author: Jeremy Seehaus

reviews.title: Great cars, poor app functinality.
reviews.comment: Better Navigation to the car would be great.
reviews.author: Stanislav Rayter

reviews.title: Booking countdown
reviews.comment: The countdown of the booking timer is not displaying the correct values. Other than that the app does not feel like a good Android app. Still it gets the job done.
reviews.author: Benjamin Weiss

reviews.title: Standortbestimmung
reviews.comment: funktioniert leider nicht zuverl\303\244ssig!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love DriveNow
reviews.comment: The app could be smoother, especially in slow connections, bur its doing its job.
reviews.author: Marcel Bankmann

reviews.title: Registration problem
reviews.comment: Cannot enter email id. Dialogue box has a bug
reviews.author: Kabeer Singh

reviews.title: Great concept - good app
reviews.comment: Easy to register and start using the service, DriveNow is really good. It is a bit pricey and the app isn\'t perfect (it doesn\'t always save the logins), but it doesn\'t seem to be buggy. If you want to register for 9.95\342\202\254 instead of 29.95\342\202\254 with 15 free minutes, use this code: YTIDQYJDTV
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works flawless
reviews.comment: Perfect for city people without a car! To register for 9.95\342\202\254 and get 15 free Minutes use this code: ZQTRTOGQFM
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Klasse
reviews.comment: Top Abwicklung, top service! Wer sich kosteng\303\274nstig anmelden m\303\266chte (9,95 + 15 freiminuten) : einfach code bei der Anmeldung angeben: CUHNJSUHKY
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on Start
reviews.comment: Application crashes on start on HTC Desire S phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ziemlich gute App (+g\303\274nstig Anmelden)
reviews.comment: Bin schon Vier Monaten bei DriveNow - GPS funktioniert und einfach geniale Service. App ist manchmal ein klein wenig zu langsam. Code AZOXFDVFFJ nutzen - Anmelden kostet dann nur 9,95 Euro und ihr erhaltet noch 15 min Freifahrtzeit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sieht gut aus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Geht so
reviews.comment: Die Karte l\303\244dt recht langsam. Bitte mehr als 5 poi erlauben und das Gesch\303\244ftsgebiet in D\303\274sseldorf anzeigen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy & unreliable
reviews.comment: won\'t find cars at all zoom levels, nice UI idea but the implementation needs thorough testing. At best a beta.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps forgetting Login & PW...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice interface and works well most of the time but it\'s not bug free, specially when making car booking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gute app mit Problemen
reviews.comment: App ist eigentlich super. 2 Probleme: bei deaktiviertem GPS werden keine Autos angezeigt (htc desire). Es fehlt ein aktualisieren Button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: F\303\274r mich nicht mehr nutzbar
reviews.comment: Fahrzeuge werden bei mir nicht mehr angezeigt! Htc desire froyo
reviews.author: A Google User
